main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a whitish object hovering at about 3000 ft in Clinchco, Virginia on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed under poor visibility conditions,The object appeared to be approximately the size of a full moon,No noise was heard during the observation,The object was observed for about 10 minutes with no change in position or speed,The civilian observer considered the object to be unidentified.
